snippet.title: Release Trailer | Call of the Wild: The Angler
snippet.description:
From the creators of theHunter: Call of the Wild comes a genre-defying fishing experience! Explore a vast open world in search of the perfect fishing spot. Ride the waters on your own or with friends as you embark on the journey to become a master angler.

Call of the Wild: The Angler is now available on PC via Steam, the Microsoft Store, and Epic Games Store for USD$29.99. Consoles will follow at a later date.

Steam - https://avlche.com/TASteam
Epic Games Store - https://avlche.com/TAEGS
Microsoft Store - https://avlche.com/MStore


🎣 Visit The Angler website to learn more: https://avlche.com/COTWTheAngler


🐟 EXPLORE A VAST OPEN WORLD

Experience the freedom of fishing in a living, breathing open world. Explore the great outdoors by boat, off-road vehicle, or on foot, and discover turquoise-colored springs, majestic alpine peaks, hidden ponds, and charming outposts. Whether you chase that elusive catch, relax at your favorite spot, or just get lost off the beaten path, every trip will have you coming back for more.

🐟 EXPERIENCE AUTHENTIC FISHING

Battle a variety of unique species in an authentic and engaging fishing experience. Each fish type has its own set of behaviors and traits, which influence what tackle they’re attracted to, how they fight when hooked, and what actions they can perform to escape. Combined with a system that realistically spawns fish based on water depth, temperature, altitude, and more, every catch becomes a lasting memory.

🐟 BECOME A MASTER ANGLER

Master distinct fishing techniques and adapt your strategy to land the most impressive catch. Purchase gear and build custom fishing rigs using a wide selection of rods, reels, lures, hooks, floats, and jigheads. Create your angler and customize their look and attributes. Complete challenges to earn unique rewards and discover the world through meaningful story missions.

🐟 PLAY SOLO OR WITH FRIENDS

Experience fishing like never before in online co-op multiplayer for up to 12 players. Meet fellow anglers, explore the open world in a shared vehicle or boat, and go on unforgettable fishing expeditions together. You can also play on your own or in offline mode for an even more peaceful experience.

🐟 A GAME THAT GROWS AND EVOLVES WITH YOU

Call of the Wild: The Angler will continue to deliver memorable new fishing experiences with regular post-launch content updates in close collaboration with the community.


💙 Join the #COTWTheAngler Community:
  •  Discord:  https://avlche.com/TheAnglerDiscord
  •  Reddit:  https://avlche.com/TheAnglerReddit
  •  Twitch:  https://avlche.com/EWTwitch
  •  Twitter:  https://avlche.com/TheAnglerTW
  •  Facebook:  https://avlche.com/TheAnglerFB
